Class Robot

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.Robot

  • public class Robot
extends Object
    This class encapsulates the robot systems.
    Author:
    fauzi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Robot(MyJoystick joytick) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getGyroLeft()
      Gets the value of the left gyro.
      double getGyroRight()
      Gets the value of the right gyro.
      boolean getRetrieveStat()
      Get the status of the retriever, true means active.
      void resetGyros()
      Resets the gryo's back to zero.
      void run() 
      void setRetrieve(boolean bRetrieveVal)
      Sets the retriever, true means active.
      void setSpeed(double dLeft, double dRight)
      Set the speed of the left and right motors, values allowed are -1 to 1.
      void stopRobot()
      Stops the robot and sets everything to false or zero, does not disable the ability to use it though.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
